p: Low (<200/Î¼l) CD4 + cell counts or not being on antiretroviral therapy have been suggested as contributing factors for a higher severity of COVID-19 in PLWH [ 13, 14]. Moreover, other general factors may be over-represented in PLWH. In Spain more than three quarters of PLWH are men [ 15], and among PLWH over 50 years of age more than 50% have comorbidities [ 16].
